verses.verse: Then it came <S%H1961><s%> about after <S%H310><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> the cupbearer <S%H9307><s%> and the baker <S%H644><s%> for the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> offended <S%H2398><s%> their lord, <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was furious <S%H7107><s%> with his two <S%H8147><s%> officials, <S%H5631><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%> cupbearer <S%H9307><s%> and the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker. <S%H644><s%>

So he put <S%H5414><s%> them in confinement <S%H4929><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the bodyguard, <S%H2876><s%> in the jail, <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> the [same] place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was imprisoned. <S%H631><s%>

And the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the bodyguard <S%H2876><s%> put <S%H6485><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> in charge <S%H6485><s%> of them, and he took <S%H8334><s%> care <S%H8334><s%> of them; and they were in confinement <S%H4929><s%> for some <S%H3117><s%> time. <S%H3117><s%>

Then the cupbearer <S%H9307><s%> and the baker <S%H644><s%> for the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were confined <S%H631><s%> in jail, <S%H1004><s%> <S%H5470><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> had <S%H2492><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%> the same <S%H259><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> each <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> with his [own] dream <S%H2472><s%> [and] each <S%H376><s%> dream <S%H2472><s%> with its [own] interpretation. <S%H6623><s%>
When Joseph <S%H3130><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to them in the morning <S%H1242><s%> and observed <S%H7200><s%> them, behold, <S%H2009><s%> they were dejected. <S%H2196><s%>

And he asked <S%H7592><s%> Pharaoh's officials <S%H5631><s%> who <S%H834><s%> were with him in confinement <S%H4929><s%> in his master's house, <S%H1004><s%> "Why <S%H4069><s%> are your faces <S%H6440><s%> so sad <S%H7451><s%> today <S%H3117><s%>?"

Then they said <S%H559><s%> to him, "We have had <S%H2492><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%> and there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> to interpret <S%H6622><s%> it." Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Do not interpretations <S%H6623><s%> belong to God <S%H430><s%>? Tell <S%H5608><s%> [it] to me, please. <S%H4994><s%>"

So the chief <S%H8269><s%> cupbearer <S%H9307><s%> told <S%H5608><s%> his dream <S%H2472><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "In my dream, <S%H2472><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> [there was] a vine <S%H1612><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of me;

and on the vine <S%H1612><s%> [were] three <S%H7969><s%> branches. <S%H8299><s%> And as it was budding, <S%H6524><s%> its blossoms <S%H9340><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> out, [and] its clusters <S%H811><s%> produced <S%H1310><s%> ripe <S%H1310><s%> grapes. <S%H6025><s%>

"Now Pharaoh's cup <S%H3563><s%> was in my hand; <S%H3027><s%> so I took <S%H3947><s%> the grapes <S%H6025><s%> and squeezed <S%H7818><s%> them into Pharaoh's cup, <S%H3563><s%> and I put <S%H5414><s%> the cup <S%H3563><s%> into Pharaoh's hand. <S%H3709><s%>"

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "This <S%H2088><s%> is the interpretation <S%H6623><s%> of it: the three <S%H7969><s%> branches <S%H8299><s%> are three <S%H7969><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%>

within three <S%H7969><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will lift <S%H5375><s%> up your head <S%H7218><s%> and restore <S%H7725><s%> you to your office; <S%H3653><s%> and you will put <S%H5414><s%> Pharaoh's cup <S%H3563><s%> into his hand <S%H3027><s%> according to your former <S%H7223><s%> custom <S%H4941><s%> when <S%H834><s%> you were his cupbearer. <S%H9307><s%>

"Only <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> keep <S%H2142><s%> me in mind when <S%H9201><s%> it goes <S%H3190><s%> well <S%H3190><s%> with you, and please <S%H4994><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> me a kindness <S%H2617><s%> by mentioning <S%H2142><s%> me to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and get <S%H3318><s%> me out of this <S%H2088><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

"For I was in fact <S%H1589><s%> kidnapped <S%H1589><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> and even <S%H1571><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> nothing <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3972><s%> that they should have put <S%H7760><s%> me into the dungeon. <S%H953><s%>"

When the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker <S%H644><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that he had interpreted <S%H6622><s%> favorably, <S%H2896><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> "I also <S%H637><s%> [saw] in my dream, <S%H2472><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> [there were] three <S%H7969><s%> baskets <S%H5536><s%> of white <S%H2751><s%> bread <S%H2751><s%> on my head; <S%H7218><s%>

and in the top <S%H5945><s%> basket <S%H5536><s%> [there were] some <S%H4480><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> sorts of baked <S%H644><s%> food <S%H3978><s%> for Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and the birds <S%H5775><s%> were eating <S%H398><s%> them out of the basket <S%H5536><s%> on my head. <S%H7218><s%> "

Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> is its interpretation: <S%H6623><s%> the three <S%H7969><s%> baskets <S%H5536><s%> are three <S%H7969><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%>

within three <S%H7969><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will lift <S%H5375><s%> up your head <S%H7218><s%> from you and will hang <S%H8518><s%> you on a tree; <S%H6086><s%> and the birds <S%H5775><s%> will eat <S%H398><s%> your flesh <S%H1320><s%> off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> you. "

Thus it came <S%H1961><s%> about on the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> [which was] Pharaoh's birthday, <S%H3205><s%> <S%H3117><s%> that he made <S%H6213><s%> a feast <S%H4960><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> his servants; <S%H5650><s%> and he lifted <S%H5375><s%> up the head <S%H7218><s%> of the chief <S%H8269><s%> cupbearer <S%H9307><s%> and the head <S%H7218><s%> of the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker <S%H644><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> his servants. <S%H5650><s%>
And he restored <S%H7725><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%> cupbearer <S%H9307><s%> to his office, <S%H4945><s%> and he put <S%H5414><s%> the cup <S%H3563><s%> into Pharaoh's hand; <S%H3709><s%>
but he hanged <S%H8518><s%> the chief <S%H8269><s%> baker, <S%H644><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had interpreted <S%H6622><s%> to them.
Yet the chief <S%H8269><s%> cupbearer <S%H9307><s%> did not remember <S%H2142><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> but forgot <S%H7911><s%> him.
